description: Ananda Prasad Pokharel (born 12 March 1960) is a Nepali politician who served as Minister for Culture, Tourism and Civil Aviation of Nepal from 2015 to 2016. He is a Central Committee Member and Bagmati Province Committee Secretary of the Nepal Communist Party (NCP). He was also elected as a Member of Parliament and a Member of the Second Constitutional Assembly. Additionally, he serves as the chairman of the Nepal China Himalayan Friendship Society (NeCHiFS) Nepal.
short_description: Nepalese politician and former Minister for Culture, Tourism and Civil Aviation of Nepal.
